items.content_html: Two-stage open-vocabulary vision pipeline combining OWLv2 detection with DINOv3 patch-level embeddings for zero-shot classification. Supports batched, GPU-accelerated inference, parallel object processing, cropped patch export, and detailed JSON + log outputs for research-grade analysis.
